document.full_text: a homeless man who allegedly robbed a florida bank and then gave away some of his loot to passengers on a public bus was expected to be arraigned in tampa on friday, authorities said.
document.title: homeless man robs bank and shares loot with bus passengers
lines_and_colors: a homeless man who allegedly robbed a florida bank and then gave away some of his loot to passengers on a public bus was expected to be arraigned in tampa on friday, authorities said.
